name: repost
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool telegrapher.
Tool description: Repost a blog post or article on Telegra.ph from a given URL. Clean up a bit the reading and encourage users to visit official sources at the same time.
API description: Reposts an article to the Telegraph platform using the Telegraph API.

article_url.description: URL of the article or blog post to be reposted.

title.description: Title of the Telegraph post. Defaults to None.

author_url.description: URL of the author. Defaults to None.

author_name.description: Name of the author. Defaults to None.
